snippet: The only one of four sisters to graduate from high school, Jasmin Gonzalez is mindful of being a positive role model to her siblings and to her young son.
abstract: New York Foundling, affiliate of Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York, one of agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Jasmin Gonzalez of Manhattan find affordable housing, and Catholic Charities helps her afford tablet computer for college classes.
lead_paragraph: The only one of four sisters to graduate from high school, Jasmin Gonzalez is mindful of being a positive role model to her siblings and to her young son.

headline.print_headline: Taking Control After a Tumultuous Childhood
headline.main: Taking Control After a Tumultuous Childhood
